instruction: <Architect> Starting on the second row and second column, place a magenta washer.
<Architect> Below it a column of four more magenta washers. All in the second column.
<Architect> On the fifth column of the second row, place a magenta washer.
<Architect> Below it again of four more magenta washers. All in the fifth column.
<Architect> On the second row, put two magenta washers in columns 3 and 4
<Architect> On the fourth row, put a magenta washer in column 3 then another one in column 4
